name: 2lb Infinity Hoop
description:
-Take your workout with you. The Infinity Travel Hula Hoop, twists to  a figure 8 shape and then folds over to a quarter of its size.

-This hula hoop is ideal for fitness, strength training and weight loss.

All Hula Hoops come with:
•      Tape Measure
•      Low Carb Eating Plan
•      30 Day Suggested Hoop Calendar

name: 5lb Acu Hoop
description:
-Acu hoop is specifically designed to slim your waist, burn calories and fat and promote weight loss. 

-It also promotes body alignment by doing circular motions from the hoop exercises and corrects the body for proper posture while keeping the hoop rotating around the waist; and most importantly, it can provide cardiovascular benefits. 

-Acu Hoop 5lb provides the best slimming result and its size and weight is ideal for adult users


-All 8 colored sections are easy to assemble, disassemble and can be easily transported to your home, gym or work.

All Hula Hoops come with:
•      Tape Measure
•      Low Carb Eating Plan
•      30 Day Suggested Hoop Calendar

name: IT WORKS! BODY WRAPS
description:
The It Works! Body Wrap is a 45-minute body Application. The Ultimate Body wrap is an all-natural non-woven cloth wrap that has been infused with a powerful, botanically-based formula to deliver maximum tightening, toning, and firming. The wrap can be applied to areas such as the stomach area, arms, thighs, back and other areas. For ultimate results, try a pack of 4. 
**Results may vary**

Savings: $10 off (when you buy 4 body wraps: 1 box of wraps normally priced at $99)

name: Organic Apple Cider Vinegar
description:
Apple cider vinegar has been used for weight loss for many years. Organic Apple Cider Vinegar might help to make you feel full, by suppressing your appetite. The suggested use is 2 tablespoons in a 16oz bottle of water prior to meals. 
**Results may vary** 

The benefits of Apple Cider Vinegar are endless:
•	Support weight loss
•	Improve digestion
•	Boost immunity
•	Improved energy levels
•	Assist with stomach bloating

name: Colombian Waist Cincher Vest
description:
The Colombian Vest Cincher 
•100% latex band with Flexi Boning supports 
•Dual column hook-and-eye closures for flexible sizing 
•Boosts thermal activity and gently lifts underbust

Looking for a bit more coverage in a latex waist cincher? This waist cincher that controls bra bulge and back fat. Its high-compression latex gives you the resistance to tone and firm your core, while still enhancing your bust. Comfortably wide shoulder straps and a full coverage back reign-in bra-bulge and back. Built-in FlexiBoning supports keep to your natural contours, letting you feel more confident knowing that bad posture wont be sabotaging your perfect silhouette. The Columbian vest assist in reducing your waistline.
